column4: hello everyone.  is it best practice to upgrade every time a new regular upgrade comes out (like Ibex)?  or wait for the next lts release?  I am on Ubuntu EEE, based on 8.04 lts
thanks, wat, action, bod. so let's say I want to upgrade to the next lts release, what is best way to keep all customizations and settings when I upgrade?
im not the one to ask about that O_O
if you have autocomplete on using xchat press tab after typing the first 1-3 letters
